sentence: Nice restaurants with different cousine
The restaurants are all of high quality not matter where you eat White Orchid is special
There was a lot of choice between all the different restaurants and the food was of an incredible standard
Buffet nights my fave so much choice for all palettes
The room was great very clean the pool area was great plenty of sun beds the pool bar attendants were friendly the private beach was clean and the beach restaurants were excellent
Great choice of food in many different restaurants buffet or al a carteand first class beverage options too
The palmito bar very good with Denis the bar tender excellent and a lovely guy
The food is great and the drinks menu is far and wide for an all inclusive one
But again the buffet and Captains bar are a very good standard so you are not left eating in your room by any means
Dinner venue and meal at the Italian restaurant was great

EVERYONE IN OUR GROUP FELT LET DOWN BY MANY POINTS AS I HAVE LISTEDON ARRIVAL WE WERE INFORMED THAT THE FAILED THOMAS COOK HAD CANCELLED OUR ACOMODATION THIS WAS UNTRUE DUE TO THE FACT THE RESORT HAD CANCELLED THE ACOMODATION AS THOMAS COOK HAD COLLAPSED PRIOR TO OUR ARRIVAL AND THE RESORT KNEW THEY WOULDNT BE PAID BY THOMAS COKWE DID NOT RECEIVE THE WINE FRESH FRUIT BASKET ETC ON ARRIVAL AS PER THE PREMIUM LOUNGE BENEFITSMOST DAYS WE COULD NOT ON RETURN GET INTO OUR ROOM DUE TO THE CARDS NOT OPERATING THE OPENING OF SAID ROOM 452 I COMPLAINED ABOUT THIS ON SEVERAL OCCASIONS THE ONLY PERSON TO HELP WAS TALEB ALDAWODI WHO HAD MAINTENANCE LOOK AT THE PROBLEM HOWEVER BEFORE WE DEPARTED THE DOOR WAS FAULTY AGAINON DINING AT THE KINARI RESTAURANT 4 MEMBERS OF OUR PARTY WERE UNWELL DUE TO THE FOOD BEING UNDER COOKED A MEDIC HAD TO BE CALLED TO ASSIST MYSELF
The greatest resort ever but the restaurants a bit high priced
It ’s not really what anyone would expect from beach bar
At least of the menu is so limited would be good if someone made sure that all the food offered is tasty and nice

Went to the rooftop bar two nights in a row and were surprised on the second night to be advised the menu had changed therefore the drinks we had the first night were no longer included as part of the all inclusive which seemed strange
I missed some menus at pool bars what you can get
A medium level buffet restaurant for two adults and two kids with only one soft drink each was aprox 620 dirham
The resort is so big you need to be given a map on which restaurants are where it ’s not very clear
I must mention the barman at the pool bar Vipin
We experience issues at one of the restaurants during lunch with the staff being unhelpful and we actually ended up leaving
